name: Aeroclub of Lebanon
about: Aeroclub of Lebanon is a premier aviation hub offering comprehensive flight training, scenic tours, and exclusive events. Established to guide both novice and aspiring pilots, our club provides year-round flights over Lebanon's stunning landscapes. We operate three single-engine planes, managed by two skilled instructors and supported by a vibrant community of pilot members. Our training programs include Private Pilot License (PPL), Instrument Rating (IR), and Night Flying, adhering to international and local aviation standards. Whether you're pursuing a pilot's license or seeking a romantic flight, Aeroclub of Lebanon ensures a safe, enjoyable, and professional flying experience. Join us to elevate your passion for flying and discover the beauty of Lebanon from above.
